title: Usage-Instances.Search.Input
description: Profile-aware input for the Usage-Instances.Search capability.

profile.description: Optional reference to the org or system profile to load.

profilePatch.description: Optional modifications to apply to the loaded profile.

org_ref.description: Non-PII reference to the organization whose asset usage should be inspected.

asset_names.description: List of asset names for which usage instances should be searched.
